comments.body: why do we put these 2 `case object` inside `object Strategy`?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@

+object Strategy {
+  /** A strategy that only runs once. */
+  case object Once extends Strategy { val maxIterations = 1 }

comments.body: First i thought about making both classes on the top level, however `org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.rules.Once` is not descriptive, while `org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.rules.Strategy.Once` is. That was my idea :)
